hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: INPUT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Get a previous job variable-value-of-"IMAGE_VERSION",Value is in ${INPUT}; Default Value do not set;

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: STATUS_CODE

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e
GIT_EMAIL="tommylike@gmail.com" IMAGE_VERSION=${INPUT} STATUS=${STATUS_CODE} PROJECT_NAME="mindspore-website-publish-03"
cd $WORKSPACE if [ ${STATUS} == "1" ];then echo "Nothing to commit,Working tree clean and exit!" exit 0 fi
if [ -d "infra-mindspore" ]; then rm -rf "infra-mindspore" fi
#if hash git 2> /dev/null; then # git clone git@github.com:opensourceways/infra-mindspore.git # cd infra-mindspore/applications/website #else # echo "git is not existing" #fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git config --global user.email $GIT_EMAIL git config --global user.name $GIT_USER git clone https://$GIT_USER:$GIT_PASS@github.com/opensourceways/infra-mindspore cd infra-mindspore/applications/website else echo "git is not existing." fi
if hash kustomize 2>/dev/null; then kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/mindspore/mindspore-website=swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/mindspore-website:$IMAGE_VERSION else echo "use replace to set image." fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git add . git commit -am "update mindspore-website image to mindspore-website:$IMAGE_VERSION" git push origin --all else echo "git is not existing." fi
ARGOCD_TOKEN=`curl -X POST -s -d '{"password":"'${ARGOCD_PASS}'","username":"'${ARGOCD_USER}'"}' "https://build.osinfra.cn/api/v1/session"|tail -1 |awk -F '[""]' '{print$4}'`>/dev/null curl -X POST -s -o /dev/null --cookie "argocd.token=${ARGOCD_TOKEN}" "https://build.osinfra.cn/api/v1/applications/${PROJECT_NAME}/sync">/dev/null if [ $? -eq 0 ];then echo "complete!" else echo "failed!" fi
